channel.title: About Lemmy
channel.description:
Lemmy is a link aggregator / reddit alternative, intended to work in the fediverse.
It's self-hostable, has live-updating comment threads, and is tiny ( `~80kB` ). Federation into the ActivityPub network is on the roadmap.
Suggest new features or report bugs at https://github.com/LemmyNet/lemmy.
:rat: See live instances: - https://dev.lemmy.ml
:vulcan_salute:Test federation: - https://voyager.lemmy.ml - https://enterprise.lemmy.ml - https://ds9.lemmy.ml
Made with [Rust](https://www.rust-lang.org), [Actix](https://actix.rs/), [Inferno](https://infernojs.org), [Typescript](https://www.typescriptlang.org/).

item.title: About Lemmy
item.dc:creator: nutomic
item.description:
Lemmy is a link aggregator / reddit alternative, intended to work in the fediverse.

It’s self-hostable, has live-updating comment threads, and is tiny ( ~80kB ). Federation into the ActivityPub network is on the roadmap.

Suggest new features or report bugs at https://github.com/LemmyNet/lemmy.

See live instances:

  • https://dev.lemmy.ml

Test federation:

  • https://voyager.lemmy.ml
  • https://enterprise.lemmy.ml
  • https://ds9.lemmy.ml

Made with Rust, Actix, Inferno, Typescript.

Read full topic
